fields.value: EMBEDDED OF WIFI AND GSM TECHNOLOGY FOR MONITORING OF ENERGY READING AND CONTROLLING OF HOUSE APPLIANCES RESPECTIVELY FOR SAVING ENERGY

authorName.value: Puli Naresh , M.Akhila , G. Ravindranath Kumar

dsDescriptionValue.value:
The main aim of this project is to monitor the usage power by using the energy meter. Normally we donâ€™t know
how power we are using the daily and how much price it is up to month ending. But in this project we can know
how power we are using every day or every hour. So we can reduce the usage of power by switch off the loads
used in the homes or industry. In this project the energy meter sends the data for every day or every one hour by
using the RTC, so we can control the usage of the power by switch off loads. In this project user can control
loads with mobile through the Wi-Fi communications and web based things. Here we can observe the daily
usage of the power and price by using the RTC, if the electricity load was high we switch off the unnecessary
loads in the home and we can control any load with the internet of things and we can operate remotely. In this
project we can see the every hour the usage of the power and price for that power , the usage of the sends to the
PC through the wifi technology and the if the power usage was high we can switch off the lights by sending the
message the to the controller through GSM technology.
